description.zh-cn: 中国花样滑冰教练及前运动员，曾执教申雪/赵宏博、庞清/佟健、张丹/张昊等多对世界级组合。曾任第十一届全国政协委员。
description.en: Chinese figure skating coach and former competitor. He has coached multiple world-class pairs, including Shen Xue/Zhao Hongbo, Pang Qing/Tong Jian, and Zhang Dan/Zhang Hao. He served as a member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 在美国普莱西德湖举办的第十三届冬季奥林匹克运动会。
description.en: The XIII Olympic Winter Games, held in Lake Placid, United States.

description.zh-cn: 在南斯拉夫萨拉热窝举办的第十四届冬季奥林匹克运动会。
description.en: The XIV Olympic Winter Games, held in Sarajevo, Yugoslavia.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会
en: 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的第十一届会议，任期从2008年至2013年。
description.en: The 11th session of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, serving from 2008 to 2013.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国黑龙江省的省会，姚滨的出生地。
description.en: The capital of Heilongjiang Province, China, and the birthplace of Yao Bin.

description.zh-cn: 姚滨是申雪的教练。
description.en: Yao Bin was the coach of Shen Xue.

description.zh-cn: 姚滨是赵宏博的教练。

description.en: Yao Bin was the coach of Zhang Yue.

description.zh-cn: 姚滨是王磊的教练。
description.en: Yao Bin was the coach of Wang Lei.

description.zh-cn: 姚滨与栾波搭档参加了1980年和1984年冬季奥林匹克运动会的花样滑冰比赛。
description.en: Yao Bin partnered with Luan Bo to compete in figure skating at the 1980 and 1984 Winter Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 姚滨参加了1980年冬季奥林匹克运动会花样滑冰比赛。
description.en: Yao Bin participated in the figure skating competition at the 1980 Winter Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 姚滨参加了1984年冬季奥林匹克运动会花样滑冰比赛。
description.en: Yao Bin participated in the figure skating competition at the 1984 Winter Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 栾波与姚滨搭档参加了1980年冬季奥林匹克运动会花样滑冰比赛。
description.en: Luan Bo, partnered with Yao Bin, participated in the figure skating competition at the 1980 Winter Olympics.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 2008年，姚滨当选第十一届全国政协委员，代表体育界，分入第四十三组。
description.en: In 2008, Yao Bin was elected as a member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC, representing the sports sector in group 43.

description.zh-cn: 姚滨是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Yao Bin is a member of the Communist Party of China.
